casebody.data:
In the Matter of B.D. appealed by parents. No. 317P05-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 26, 2006. Douglas L. Hall, Morganton, for Mother. David A. Perez, for Father. Judy N. Rudolph, Attorney Advocate, for Guardian ad Litem. Renae Alt, for Buncombe County DSS.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 1st day of December 2005 by Respondents (Mother & Father) in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 26th day of January 2006."
